title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2500.1 - Statutory authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2500.1 - Statutory authority

State Regulations

This Subchapter is adopted and promulgated pursuant to
the powers granted to the State Division of Housing and Community Renewal by
the Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974, chapter 576 of the Laws of New

York for the year 1974, as amended. As used in this Subchapter, the term act
shall mean the Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974. Wherever the term

Chapter is used hereinafter to describe these regulations, it shall be deemed
to mean Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
